moTa: The Alfa Romeo 4C is available as a coupe and convertible. The 2018 4C starts at $55,900 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $1,595. It gets EPA-estimated 28 MPG combined. The Alfa Romeo 4C competes against models like the Audi S5, Audi TTS, and Chevrolet Corvette. The 4C is a good fit for luxury shoppers Luxury vehicles include all models from dedicated luxury brands plus luxurious models selected by our editors. .

The Alfa Romeo 4C Spider is available as a convertible and coming soon. The 2018 4C Spider starts at $65,900 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $1,595. It gets EPA-estimated 28 MPG combined. The Alfa Romeo 4C Spider competes against models like the Chevrolet Corvette, Jaguar F-TYPE, and Porsche 718 Boxster. The 4C Spider is a good fit for sun lovers Sun Lover vehicles have convertible tops or removable roofs. The Alfa Romeo Giulia is available as a sedan. The 2018 Giulia starts at $38,195 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $1,245. It gets EPA-estimated 20-27 MPG combined. The Alfa Romeo Giulia competes against models like the Audi A3, Toyota Avalon, and Kia Stinger. The Giulia is a good fit for luxury shoppers Luxury vehicles include all models from dedicated luxury brands plus luxurious models selected by our editors. .

The Alfa Romeo Stelvio is available as a SUV. The 2018 Stelvio starts at $41,995 (MSRP), with a destination charge of $1,245. It gets EPA-estimated 24 MPG combined. The Alfa Romeo Stelvio competes against models like the Volkswagen Tiguan, Subaru Forester, and Volkswagen Atlas.
